title: Vase in the Shape of a Pitcher, Lajevardina ware
medium: Ceramic; fritware, reticulated, molded, and painted in turquoise, red, white with gold-leaf overglaze over an opaque transparent glaze
dimensions:
7 9/16 x 5 11/16 in. (19.2 x 14.5 cm)
Diam. at mouth: 3 7/16 in. (8.7 cm)
Diam. at foot: 2 3/4 in. (7 cm)
credit_line: Gift of the Ernest Erickson Foundation, Inc.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
